argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | submabas.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | submabas.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( D Mat R ) = ( D Mat R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( D Mat R ) ) = ( Base ` ( D Mat R ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_matrcl | |- ( M e. B -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simpld | |- ( M e. B -> N e. Fin ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ssfi | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ D C_ N ) -> D e. Fin ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) -> D e. Fin ) |
| 10 | 6 | #P_simprd | |- ( M e. B -> R e. _V ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) -> R e. _V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ssel | |- ( D C_ N -> ( i e. D -> i e. N ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) -> ( i e. D -> i e. N ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) /\ i e. D ) -> i e. N ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) /\ i e. D /\ j e. D ) -> i e. N ) |
| 16 |  | #P_ssel | |- ( D C_ N -> ( j e. D -> j e. N ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) -> ( j e. D -> j e. N ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) /\ j e. D ) -> j e. N ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) /\ i e. D /\ j e. D ) -> j e. N ) |
| 20 | 2 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( M e. B <-> M e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_biimpi | |- ( M e. B -> M e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) -> M e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) /\ i e. D /\ j e. D ) -> M e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 24 | 1, 4 | #P_matecl | |- ( ( i e. N /\ j e. N /\ M e. ( Base ` A ) ) -> ( i M j ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 25 | 15, 19, 23, 24 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) /\ i e. D /\ j e. D ) -> ( i M j ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 26 | 3, 4, 5, 9, 11, 25 | #P_matbas2d | |- ( ( M e. B /\ D C_ N ) -> ( i e. D , j e. D |-> ( i M j ) ) e. ( Base ` ( D Mat R ) ) ) |
